text: Hellenism may refer to: * Hellenistic art * Hellenistic period * Hellenistic Greece * Hellenistic civilization * Proper use of the Greek * Greek people and their culture in general * Hellenization, the spread of Greek culture over foreign peoples * Hellenistic philosophy in the Hellenistic period and late antiquity * Hellenism, a movement in 18th and 19th century England and Germany * Hellenism, the study of ancient Greece (a scholar in this discipline may be called a Hellenist)
title: Hellenism
